16  package org.apache.ibatis.cache;
17  
18  import java.io.Serializable;
19  import java.util.ArrayList;
20  import java.util.List;
21  
22  public class CacheKey implements Cloneable, Serializable {
23  
24    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1146682552656046210L;
25  
26    public static final CacheKey NULL_CACHE_KEY = new NullCacheKey();
27  
28    private static final int DEFAULT_MULTIPLYER = 37;
29    private static final int DEFAULT_HASHCODE = 17;
30  
31    private int multiplier;
32    private int hashcode;
33    private long checksum;
34    private int count;
35    private List<Object> updateList;
36  
37    public CacheKey() {
38      this.hashcode = DEFAULT_HASHCODE;
39      this.multiplier = DEFAULT_MULTIPLYER;
40      this.count = 0;
41      this.updateList = new ArrayList<Object>();
42    }
43  
44    public CacheKey(Object[] objects) {
45      this();
46      updateAll(objects);
47    }
48  
49    public int getUpdateCount() {
50      return updateList.size();
51    }
52  
53    public void update(Object object) {
54      int baseHashCode = object == null ? 1 : object.hashCode();
55  
56      count++;
57      checksum += baseHashCode;
58      baseHashCode *= count;
59  
60      hashcode = multiplier * hashcode + baseHashCode;
61  
62      updateList.add(object);
63    }
64  
65    public void updateAll(Object[] objects) {
66      for (Object o : objects) {
67        update(o);
68      }
69    }
70  
71    public boolean equals(Object object) {
72      if (this == object) return true;
73      if (!(object instanceof CacheKey)) return false;
74  
75      final CacheKey cacheKey = (CacheKey) object;
76  
77      if (hashcode != cacheKey.hashcode) return false;
78      if (checksum != cacheKey.checksum) return false;
79      if (count != cacheKey.count) return false;
80  
81      for (int i = 0; i < updateList.size(); i++) {
82        Object thisObject = updateList.get(i);
83        Object thatObject = cacheKey.updateList.get(i);
84        if (thisObject == null) {
85          if (thatObject != null) return false;
86        } else {
87          if (!thisObject.equals(thatObject)) return false;
88        }
89      }
90      return true;
91    }
92  
93    public int hashCode() {
94      return hashcode;
95    }
96  
97    public String toString() {
98      StringBuilder returnValue = new StringBuilder().append(hashcode).append(':').append(checksum);
99      for (int i = 0; i < updateList.size(); i++) {
100       returnValue.append(':').append(updateList.get(i));
101     }
102 
103     return returnValue.toString();
104   }
105 
106   @Override
107   public CacheKey clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
108     CacheKey clonedCacheKey = (CacheKey) super.clone();
109     clonedCacheKey.updateList = new ArrayList<Object>(updateList);
110     return clonedCacheKey;
111   }
112 
113 }
